articles.author: ALANNA DURKIN RICHER, JENNIFER PELTZ, MICHAEL R. SISAK
articles.title: Key takeaways from the opening statements in Donald Trump's hush money trial - The Associated Press
articles.description: The opening statements in the first criminal trial of a former American president provided a clear roadmap of how prosecutors will try to make the case that Donald Trump broke the law, and how the defense plans to fight the charges on multiple fronts. Lawyers…
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) Mondays opening statements in the first criminal trial of a former American president provided a clear roadmap of how prosecutors will try to make the case that Donald Trump broke the l… [+8726 chars]
